summary: This bill, the Sustaining America’s Fisheries for the Future Act of 2025, reauthorizes and amends the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act. It addresses climate change impacts on fisheries, supports fishing communities, strengthens public process and transparency, modernizes fisheries science and data collection, and promotes international fisheries management. Key focuses include climate resilience, working waterfronts, tribal representation, data modernization, essential fish habitat protection, bycatch reduction, and rebuilding overfished fisheries. It also provides increased funding for NOAA.
